title: Unseen Menace
content:
Unseen Menace Rare 2~11 Damage 1d10+1Piercing Invisible Weapon: This weapon is Invisible while equipped. It loses this property for 2 rounds on a missed Attack Roll. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Concussive energy thumps like a mighty heartbeat from this pike. PikeTwo-Handed Extra Reach 8.1 190

Invisible Weapon: This weapon is Invisible while equipped. It loses this property for 2 rounds on a missed Attack Roll.
